detectors.description:
OwnedProxyWithReference (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/ropsten/sorted/0.6.0/93A1eA3e691d03Df1514122bEbE1A19a3F15CE76_OwnedProxyWithReference.sol/93A1eA3e691d03Df1514122bEbE1A19a3F15CE76_OwnedProxyWithReference.sol#241-430) is an upgradeable proxy.
implementation was found in a different contract.
implementation is an address state variable.
ImplementationReference.implementation (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/ropsten/sorted/0.6.0/93A1eA3e691d03Df1514122bEbE1A19a3F15CE76_OwnedProxyWithReference.sol/93A1eA3e691d03Df1514122bEbE1A19a3F15CE76_OwnedProxyWithReference.sol#209) gets value from a cross-contract call: ImplementationReference(implementationReference).implementation()
ImplementationReference appears to be a Beacon contract for the proxy
The address of ImplementationReference is loaded from storage slot implementationReferencePosition = keccak256(bytes)(trueFiPool.implementation.reference)
Missing compatibility check in ImplementationReference.constructor(address)
Missing compatibility check in ImplementationReference.setImplementation(address)
To remove upgradeability, delete setImplementation from ImplementationReference
